Constructor Detail

DesktopAlert

public DesktopAlert(java.lang.String title,
                    java.lang.String desc,
                    java.awt.Color color1,
                    java.awt.Color color2,
                    java.awt.Dimension size)
Constructor of DesktopAlert without image

Parameters:
title - Title of the alert
desc - Description that will appear inside the alert
color1 - Upper gradient color
color2 - Lower gradient color
size - Size of the DesktopAlert

DesktopAlert

public DesktopAlert(java.lang.String title,
                    java.lang.String desc,
                    java.awt.Image image,
                    java.awt.Color color1,
                    java.awt.Color color2,
                    java.awt.Dimension size)
Constructor of DesktopAlert with image

Parameters:
title - Title of the alert
desc - Description that will appear inside the alert
image - Image that will appear inside the alert The Image will be automatically resized according to the size of the alert. Using images with the same width:height ratio of the alert is recommended
color1 - Upper gradient color
color2 - Lower gradient color
size - Size of the DesktopAlert
Method Detail

popUp

public void popUp(boolean isUpward,
                  int speed,
                  int time)
Sets the alert visible & Moves the alert

Parameters:
isUpward - isUpward is true when the alert pops up from the bottom of the desktop (vertical), false when the alert pops up from the right side (horizontal).
speed - Speed of the alert's movement (usual value is 10 to 50)
time - Total time (in miliseconds) of alert's visibility (usual value is 1000 to 5000)

setTitleText

public void setTitleText(java.lang.String title)
Sets text of the title bar

Parameters:
title - Text of the title-bar

setDescText

public void setDescText(java.lang.String text)
Sets main text content of the alert

Parameters:
text - Text that will appear inside the alert

setAlertImage

public void setAlertImage(java.awt.Image image)
Sets the image of the alert

Parameters:
image - The image that will appear inside the alert

removeAlertImage

public void removeAlertImage()
Removes the image from the alert. The alert will contain no image after removal

getTitleText

public java.lang.String getTitleText()
Gets text of the title bar

Returns:
Text of the title

getDescText

public java.lang.String getDescText()
Gets the main text content of the alert

Returns:
Main text content

setDescFont

public void setDescFont(java.awt.Font font)
Sets the font of the content text of the alert
